Question: A square piece of paper has the letter 'F' written on it, facing up as shown below:

    ████
    █
    ███
    █
    █

If you fold this square paper along its vertical midline (from top to bottom) and hold it up to the light from behind, what will the letter look like? Choose from the following options:

A) █████
   █
   ████
   █
   █

B) ████
     █
   ███
     █
     █

C) █████
      █
   ████
      █
      █

D) ████
    █
   ███
    █
    █
